original_text: How long will ye vex my soul, and break me in pieces with words?
korean_text: 너희가 내 마음을 괴롭히며 말로 나를 짓부수기를 어느 때까지 하겠느냐

sentences.original_text: How long will ye vex my soul
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 얼마나 오랫동안 내 영혼을 괴롭히겠느냐

sentences.original_text: and break me in pieces with words?
